short_summary: Wireless mobile column lift system and equipment usage demo
description:
NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT


Description of the Requirement:\nThe Department of National Defence (DND), specifically the Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) has a requirement for one (1) Wireless Mobile Column Lift System and a demonstration of equipment usage.
full_summary:
# Wireless Mobile Column Lift System Tender Announcement
## Solicitation Number: W6369-23-X050
## Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites interested parties to submit proposals for the procurement of one (1) Wireless Mobile Column Lift System and a demonstration of equipment usage.

### Key Requirements

* Delivery of the Wireless Mobile Column Lift System to: Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), Technical Support Service (Ottawa-Gatineau), 2380 Lancaster Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Z4, Canada
* Submission of all deliverables within six (6) months after Contract award
* Specification in accordance with the attached Statement of Requirement (SOR) and the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) for vehicle lifts (23101661)

### Security Clearance
No security clearance is required for this Contract.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPaFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCoFTA)

### Tender Overview

* Deadline for submission: 2023-07-31, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* Notice URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)
* RFP documents available in English and French
* Evaluation criteria: Lowest Price

### Contact Information
Ryan Wong
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
Phone: (819) 939-8266
Email: [Ryan.Wong@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Ryan.Wong@forces.gc.ca)

### Attachment
The RFP documents, including the SOR, can be found at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) 

Note: All dates and times mentioned are in Eastern Time. Interested parties are encouraged to review the RFP documents and submission guidelines carefully. Any inquiries or requests should be directed to the contact information above. 

Please let me know if you need any further adjustments.

**Answer at the bottom of this response.**

---
